sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './MyBets.css'; const MyBets = ({ bets }) => { return (

My Bets

{bets.map((bet, index) => (
{new Date().toLocaleString()}
{bet.team} - {bet.opponent}
Winner (incl. overtime)
{bet.team} {bet.odds}
Match Time: {bet.matchTime}
Wager
CA${bet.wager.toFixed(2)}
Return
CA${bet.returnAmount.toFixed(2)}
))}
); }; export default MyBets;
